#include <stdio.h>

int main()
{
    int t, n, i, a, min, max;
    scanf("%d %d", &t, &n);
    while (t--)
    {
        min = 101;
        max = -1;
        for (i=0; i<n; i++)
        {
            scanf("%d", &a);
            if (a < min)
                min = a;
            if (a > max)
                max = a;
        }
        printf("%d\n", max-min);
    }
    return 0;
}
